sourcesContent:
const initialState={
    fullName: [],
    preferredName: [''],
    birthDate: [null],
    gender: [''],
    maritalStatus: [''],
    currentStreet1: [''],
    currentStreet2: [''],
    currentCity: [''],
    currentState: [''],
    currentCountry: [''],
    currentAddressProof: [],
    permanentStreet1: [''],
    permanentStreet2: [''],
    permanentCity: [''],
    permanentState: [''],
    permanentCountry: [''],
    permanentAddressProof: [],
    emergencyName1: [''],
    emergencyMobile1: [''],
    emergencyRelationship1: [''],
    emergencyName2: [''],
    emergencyMobile2: [''],
    emergencyRelationship2: [''],
    jobHireDate: [null],
    jobSalary: [''],
    jobCurrentSalary: [''],
    jobBond: [''],
    idProof: [],
    picture: [],
    feedback: ['']
}
const EmployeeReducer=(state=initialState,action)=>{
    switch(action.type){
        case "SHOW_EMPLOYEE":
            return state
        case "ADD_EMPLOYEE":
            return{
               state:action.payload
            }
            default:
                return state
    }
}
export default EmployeeReducer
